channel.title: Services on Pozibl - the art of the possible
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Pozibl - the art of the possible

item.title: Architecture Labs
item.description:
Not sure about the impact of alternative technology choices on total cost to build? Pozible can assist through modelling various options and assessing their relative costs and benefits.

Example studies include:

  • Last mile technology choice (eg: fibre vs wireless)
  • Network capacity and coverage strategic forward planning
  • Next generation PON deployment strategies
  • MDU capacity strategies
  • etc…

item.title: Design Validation
item.description:
Are your as-built records fit for your operational needs?

Pozibl can offer an independent validation of HLD, LLD as well as As-Built designs you receive from 3rd party subcontractors.

Get in touch to see a demonstration of out design validation capability.

item.title: GIS Data Pipelines
item.description:
Concerned that you’re not leveraging your GIS assets fully? Using your data effectively can help improve your business decisions, saving you money.

The AI boom has spawned huge developments in data storage technologies that are optimized for heavy geospatial operations.

The team at Pozibl have experience implementing end-to-end data pipelines that leverage these latest technologies. Maximise the value embedded in your data by making it accessible throughout the network deployment lifecycle.

item.title: Network Feasibility Analysis
item.description:
Want to evaluate the economic feasibility of a network deployment? Spending effort up-front to fully evaluate a potential development can help de-risk a project by highlighting key sensitivities and dependencies.

The team at Pozibl have many years of experience developing software tools to assist in answering typical questions, such as:

  • What will the network cost?
  • What is the expected rate of return?
  • What is my peak funding requirement?
  • What are the key factors that can materially impact the success-or-not of the project?
  • etc…

item.title: Smart Integrations
item.description:
We appreciate that nobody really wants to introduce another software tool or platform to their existing workflow.

Yet existing tools may not have the exact functionality you’re looking for…

Pozibl offer consulting services to deliver bespoke solutions that address your specific pain points, integrated into your current workflows to ease their adoption.
